name: primitive-avatar
description: Avatar with image, fallback initials, status dot, and group stacking
postMessage:
Requires shadcn/ui setup: npx shadcn@latest init
Import: import { Avatar, AvatarImage, AvatarFallback, AvatarGroup } from '@/components/ui/avatar'
Usage: <Avatar size='lg' status='online'><AvatarImage src='...' /><AvatarFallback>AB</AvatarFallback></Avatar>
